description: Jiri Lubov is chopping wood when he notices Martin Valko walk by and into the cabin.  Martin goes over to a window where Jiri is sure to see him and gives him an eyefull.  Martin walks out onto the front steps and Jiri puts down the axe so that he can concentrate on Martin's tool.  Martin returns the favor by sucking Jiri before he fucks him.
title: The Plowboys, Scene #02
